name: AVCaptureVideoPreviewLayer
desc: A Core Animation layer that displays the video as it’s captured.

items.name: videoGravity
items.desc: Indicates how the layer displays the video content within its bounds.

items.name: isPreviewing
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the layer is rendering video frames from its source.

items.name: connection
items.desc: The capture connection describing the AVCaptureInputPort to which the preview layer is connected.

items.name: setSessionWithNoConnection
items.desc: Attaches the layer to a given session without implicitly forming a connection.

items.name: captureDevicePointConverted
items.desc: Converts a point from layer coordinates to the coordinate space of the capture device.

items.name: layerPointConverted
items.desc: Converts a point from the coordinate space of the capture device to the coordinate space of the layer.

items.name: layerRectConverted
items.desc: Converts a rectangle in the coordinate system used for metadata outputs to one in the preview layer’s coordinate system.

items.name: metadataOutputRectConverted
items.desc: Converts a rectangle in the preview layer’s coordinate system to one in the coordinate system used for metadata outputs.

items.name: transformedMetadataObject
items.desc: Converts a metadata object’s visual properties to layer coordinates.
